That's laughable! Trust me Americans do NOT speak English!

@cookesrc
LOL! I bet most most of those 'eurotrash' people are way smarter than the average hamburger eating hillbilly American... By the way; all movies made in the UK are far better than those fake American movies.

People, let's try to bear in mind, that like everything else, movies are a subjective thing.

What appeals to one, will not appeal to another. That does not reflect either way, on the content. But it shows, that what one person finds to be "good", and another "bad", differs in varying degrees.

I personally LOVE this film. But that's me. I'm sure that not everyone will feel the same way.

To summarize, you too will LOVE this film, IF
1)You like dark comedies and/or British films
2)Liked the following movies : The Royal Tenenbaums, Rushmore, The Darjeeling Limited.

ps. Watch the trailer on youtube, BEFORE you download a film. The trailer will give you some idea as to whether you're likely to like the film or not.

Now...let's everyone hug, and make up~ :)
